name: Newnan LINC, Phase 1
beginning: Intersection of Summerlin Blvd & Newnan Crossing Blvd, Newnan, GA 30265
end: Intersection of Highwoods Pkwy & Pecan Crescent, Newnan, GA 30265
notes: This trail features woods, bridges, a tunnel under Lower Fayetteville Road, a mural, a big hill, and a healthy dose of peace and quiet. Phase 2 of the LINC is under construction.
